revisions.rev:
{{unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Television | show_name = Yeh Chanda Kanoon Hai | image = | format = [[Comedy]] | picture_format = [[480i]] ([[SDTV]]) | creator = SAB TV Team | director = Rajan wagdhare | producer = | country = [[India]] | network = [[SAB TV]] | first_aired = 2009 | last_aired = 2010 | languages = Hindi | website = [http://www.sabtv.com/comedy/character_details.php?sid=16&cid=432#c_432 Website on Sab TV] }} '''''Yeh Chanda Kanoon Hai''''' is an Indian comedy-series that airs on [[SAB TV]] channel from [[Wednesday]] to [[Thursday]] at 10:30 pm. It is written by [[Sameer Iqbal Patel]] and [[Manoj santoshi]],<ref>[http://www.filmyfriday.com/television/tv-news/double-trouble-brings-court-room-comedy/]</ref>. It replaced [[Yes Boss]].
==Plot== It is based on the life of the protagonist Chanda Rani who is a lawyer and is secretly divorced to another lawyer, Vibhuti Narayan. This show has funny court scenes. The judge Prem Kapoor often shows a soft side to Chanda Rani, which irritates Vibhuti Narayan.
==Main characters== ===Chanda Rani=== She is the protagonist of the serial. She is secretly divorced to Vibhuti Narayan. Her cleverness, smartness and acting skills help her to take an advantage in any case she fights, specially because the Judge shows a soft side to her.
===Vibhuti Narayan=== He comes from a family of lawyers and thinks that his job is bigger than the biggest. He gets very irritated when his divorced wife comes to that court where he practices law.
